participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Frank is a warm-hearted and introspective individual who enjoys sharing stories from his past and values meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Lisa is an upbeat and adventurous person who enjoys exploring new things and has a curious nature.
participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i have never been out of ohio. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.

content.text: I love vegetables too! How about you?
Will you eat pizza with tomato?
I love Mexican food. Do you like to watch battle star galactic?
Cool. What do you enjoy doing most?
